# Copilot Instructions for Second-Assignment-Comp-Sci

This repository contains a computer science assignment project.

## General Guidelines

- Follow standard coding best practices and conventions for the programming language(s) used in this repository
- Write clear, readable, and well-documented code with appropriate comments
- Include proper error handling and input validation where applicable
- Ensure code is properly formatted and follows consistent style guidelines

## Code Quality

- Maintain clean and maintainable code structure
- Use meaningful variable and function names
- Break down complex logic into smaller, reusable functions
- Avoid code duplication - follow the DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) principle

## Documentation

- Update README.md when adding new features or making significant changes
- Include inline comments for complex logic or non-obvious code sections
- Document function parameters, return values, and any side effects

## Testing and Validation

- Validate that any code changes work as expected before committing
- Test edge cases and error conditions
- Ensure backward compatibility when modifying existing functionality
